page.title: 08 Barr's Irn Bru
page.content: Barr's Mineral Water Factory is situated in the Gallowgate near Parkhead Cross. They have been in business for l50 years and their most famous product is 'Irn Bru'. (Made from Girders). Irn Bru has a secret recipe known only to Mr Robin Barr. It is sold to many countries, including Canada, the U.S.A. and the Middle East. Approximately l million bottles of Irn Bru are produced in one week and a normal year sees the production of about 44 million bottles. Many other flavours of mineral drinks are made by Barrs, and their raw ingredients are imported from many countries including China, Germany, Ireland and Cuba. They already have one very modern bottling plant, and are hoping to renew their other, older plant in the near future.
